'''The Finishing Touch''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series IV]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat [[Beneath the Dragon-Queller|Azhdaha]] without ever having gained a [[Shields|shield]].

==Notes==
* Even without bringing a party member that can generate a shield, it is still possible to trigger [[Crystallize]] reactions with Azhdaha and pick one up by mistake.
